org.apache.lucene.document

Class XYShapeBoundingBoxQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.Query
      • org.apache.lucene.document.XYShapeBoundingBoxQuery

  • public class XYShapeBoundingBoxQuery
extends Query
    Finds all previously indexed cartesian shapes that intersect the specified bounding box.

    The field must be indexed using XYShape.createIndexableFields(java.lang.String, org.apache.lucene.geo.XYPolygon) added per document.

    WARNING: This API is experimental and might change in incompatible ways in the next release.
